description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ffi0","text":"This protocol introduces a cost-effective alternative for end repair and dA-tailing in DNA library preparation, particularly tailored for samples with an N50 of 3 kb. By employing a homebrew end repair reagent solution, this method replaces the use of the NEBNext® Ultra™ II End Repair/dA-Tailing Module recommended by Nanopore. Optimization of reagent quantities and a bead-free purification method are combined to achieve efficient adapter ligation while minimizing costs. Notably, an extended incubation time during adapter ligation enhances efficiency. This resource provides a strategic approach for researchers aiming to customize their sequencing workflows while achieving optimal results and substantial savings.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"flk74","text":"Optimized Homebrew Approach: This protocol features a unique homebrew end repair reagent solution as a cost-effective alternative to the Nanopore-recommended NEBNext® Ultra™ II End Repair/dA-Tailing Module. Adhere to the specified volumes meticulously to achieve successful results with your customized reagent.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"h17o","text":"Bead-Free Purification: The protocol employs a bead-free PEG/NaCl precipitation method for efficient purification. Ensure precise centrifugation to maintain DNA pellet integrity and maximize recovery rates.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71dr9","text":"Strategic Ligation Enhancement: An extended incubation period during adapter ligation enhances efficiency. Dedicate adequate time to this step to optimize adapter ligation results.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":24,"offset":56,"style":"bold"}],"key":"d3ke0","text":"This adjustment is primarily due to our utilization of a bead-free purification method later on, which significantly enhances the recovery rate.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8ih2","text":"Incubate at room temperature for .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"oq44","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7gg1d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17tl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ssus","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":21,"offset":88,"style":"bold"}],"key":"fiec4","text":"Despite the official recommendation of a 5-minute reaction, based on our own experience, a 60-minute reaction significantly improves adapter ligation efficiency.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bb3pj","text":"Add  of NP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6rct","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4di53","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"efg2p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4bsd","text":"1. Due to the high concentration of PEG in the solution, it may be slightly viscous. Gently invert several times to ensure thorough and uniform mixing.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":48,"offset":240}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":48,"offset":240,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"key":"7ulpl","text":"2. Normally, PEG and NaCl buffer is required for DNA precipitation. However, it's evident that LNB buffer already contains a high concentration of PEG, so adding NP alone is sufficient for DNA precipitation. For more information, refer to: https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.7erhjd6.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"9D19ED703B4C11EE94F30A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.7erhjd6"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bs0do","text":"Centrifuge at maximum speed (at least 8000 rpm) for at least   (If a higher recovery rate is needed, centrifuging for up to one hour is also possible).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dtv3l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6un66","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ophk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eip1l","text":"To prevent overheating, it is recommended to use a refrigerated centrifuge. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2lotu","text":"If a refrigerated centrifuge is unavailable, it is advised to perform centrifugation in two steps of 15 minutes each, with a 10-minute interval in between.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gg5r","text":"Carefully remove the supernatant using a pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83hku","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1de4g","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"38j1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7n2si","text":"Most of the time, the pellet is not visible to the naked eye, so pay attention to the orientation during centrifugation","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"86t3t","text":"Add 200 uL of LFB wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32f84","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8nik3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1t47n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":16,"offset":31,"style":"bold"}],"key":"306vf","text":"Note that in this step, use the LFB wash buffer instead of alcohol. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dj4kp","text":"This is because the DNA now has motor proteins attached, and using alcohol could disrupt the motor proteins.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d3imo","text":"Carefully remove the supernatant using a pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7h2i","text":"Repeat the above washing step twice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2a83r","text":"Add   of EB buffer (provided by the Ligation Sequencing Kit).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b56ps","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f1o3e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1ln8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7tg9i","text":"Optional: Measure the DNA concentration. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":20,"offset":48,"style":"bold"}],"key":"8aobl","text":"                Normally, the DNA concentration should be \u003e15 ng/μL.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fph1p","text":"Centrifuge at maximum speed (at least 8000 rpm) for ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"DAA9B9093B5011EE94F30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"5r3b8","text":"1. Ethanol Flammability: Ethanol is highly flammable. Use caution when handling and storing ethanol solutions. Work in well-ventilated areas away from open flames, sparks, or heat sources.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
